In der Hoch-Obrigkeitl. Buchtruckerey zu Bern und folgende Bücher in gar geringem Preiß zu haben, als:

J. H RingieriCX. Conciones de Ccena Dominic.3. Vol.4to.Bern.1680das Eremplar in albo achthalben bz.RisseniiSumma Theolog.in 8vo.Bern.1703à 10. Batzen, und auff Schreib-papier 14. Batzen.RodolphiCompend. Theol. Christ8vo.Bern1713à 8 Batzen.AltmannsCarechetischer Leüchter und Rauchwerck, d. i. Erklärung und Gebatt über den Heydelbergischen Catechismum,8vo.Bern,1711mit dem Kupffer-Btatt haltet 15. und ein halben Bogen,à 5. Batzen.Biblia Piscatorisin 4to.Rein,à 15. Batzen.SeelmattersEwig- vest-bestehender Berg Zion, oder: der vest-gegrundete unüberwindliche Gnaden-Stand der Kinderen GOttes, gründlich vorgestellt über die Worte des 125. Pfalms9. 1.8vo.Bern.1704à 5. Batzen.","number_of_corrections":33,"explanation":"The original XML had several issues. Firstly, there were 13 character encoding errors (mojibake), such as '√º' for 'ü', which have been corrected. Secondly, a critical well-formedness error, a mismatched closing tag ('' instead of ''), was fixed. Thirdly, the overall structure was improved for better semantic clarity and to resolve mixed content issues. The root tag was renamed to '', the introduction was wrapped in a '

' tag, and the list of books was enclosed in a ''. Each book entry is now wrapped in a '' tag with a sequential 'n' attribute, replacing the plain text numbering. Mixed content describing prices and other notes has been moved into dedicated tags like '', '', and ''. Specific semantic corrections include changing a tag incorrectly used for book extent from '' to '', and moving a subtitle into its parent '' tag."}

In der Hoch-Obrigkeitl. Buchtruckerey zu Bern und folgende Bücher in gar geringem Preiß zu haben, als:

J. H RingieriCX. Conciones de Ccena Dominic.3. Vol.4to.Bern.1680das Eremplar in albo achthalben bz.RisseniiSumma Theolog.in 8vo.Bern.1703à 10. Batzen, und auff Schreib-papier 14. Batzen.RodolphiCompend. Theol. Christ8vo.Bern1713à 8 Batzen.AltmannsCarechetischer Leüchter und Rauchwerck, d. i. Erklärung und Gebatt über den Heydelbergischen Catechismum,8vo.Bern,1711mit dem Kupffer-Btatt haltet 15. und ein halben Bogen,à 5. Batzen.Biblia Piscatorisin 4to.Rein,à 15. Batzen.SeelmattersEwig- vest-bestehender Berg Zion, oder: der vest-gegrundete unüberwindliche Gnaden-Stand der Kinderen GOttes, gründlich vorgestellt über die Worte des 125. Pfalms9. 1.8vo.Bern.1704à 5. Batzen.
parsed.explanation:
The original XML had several issues. Firstly, there were 13 character encoding errors (mojibake), such as '√º' for 'ü', which have been corrected. Secondly, a critical well-formedness error, a mismatched closing tag ('' instead of ''), was fixed. Thirdly, the overall structure was improved for better semantic clarity and to resolve mixed content issues. The root tag was renamed to '', the introduction was wrapped in a '

' tag, and the list of books was enclosed in a ''. Each book entry is now wrapped in a '' tag with a sequential 'n' attribute, replacing the plain text numbering. Mixed content describing prices and other notes has been moved into dedicated tags like '', '', and ''. Specific semantic corrections include changing a tag incorrectly used for book extent from '' to '', and moving a subtitle into its parent '' tag.
